root.name: Hotel Giant
root.description: Hotel Giant is a Hotel Simulation game in the same vein as Theme Hospital and other Tycoon games. The player is tasked with designing, building and running the hotel of their desire. Numerous types of hotels can be built and layouts are fully customizable. Staff (Reception, cleaners, etc...) are hired and managed. Many different rooms or amenities can be built such as: Restaurants, Pools and Spas.
